amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Manufacturing Extension Partnership program by 10 percent a year, starting in fiscal year 2005, continuing through fiscal year 2008.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 108-589 to authorize $117 million for the Manufacturing Extension Partnership and 10% yearly increases for FY06-08 and to allow the federal cost-share for MEP Centers in the FY05-08 to increase up to one-half on a case-by-case basis as determined by the Administration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gordon amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 192 (Roll no. 355).
